languages.text: {n}На мануфакторумах Кьявы Гамма запустили производство состава, переданного Кровавой паутиной. В цистернах из бронестекла состав отправили в очаги заражения и распылили на искаженные машины и затронутых порчей людей. Цеха были очищены от техномутации.{/n}

{n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мануфакторумах Кьявы Гамма запустили производство состава, переданного Кровавой паутиной. В цистернах из бронестекла состав отправили в очаги заражения и распылили на искаженные машины и затронутых порчей людей. Цеха были очищены от техномутации.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armoured glass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

{n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armoured glass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

{n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armoured glass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

{n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

{n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Manufactorien auf Kiava Gamma nahmen die Produktion der Substanz auf, die sie vom Blutgesponnenen Netz erhalten hatten. Sie wurde in Armaglas-Tanks zu den Zellen der Heimsuchung geschickt und auf Warp-Maschinen gesprüht, was sich wiederum auf die Leute auswirkte. Die Werkstätten wurden von Tech-Mutationen gesäubert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Manufactorien auf Kiava Gamma nahmen die Produktion der Substanz auf, die sie vom Blutgesponnenen Netz erhalten hatten. Sie wurde in Armaglas-Tanks zu den Zellen der Heimsuchung geschickt und auf Warp-Maschinen gesprüht, was sich wiederum auf die Leute auswirkte. Die Werkstätten wurden von Tech-Mutationen gesäubert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les manufactorums de Kiava Gamma ont lancé la production de la formule dont la composition leur a été révélée par la Toile de Sang. Stockée dans des conteneurs d'armaverre, elle a été déployée dans les foyers d'infestation et pulvérisée sur les machines corrompues et les personnes contaminées. Résultat, les ateliers ont été débarrassés des mutations technologiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les manufactorums de Kiava Gamma ont lancé la production de la formule dont la composition leur a été révélée par la Toile de Sang. Stockée dans des conteneurs d'armaverre, elle a été déployée dans les foyers d'infestation et pulvérisée sur les machines corrompues et les personnes contaminées. Résultat, les ateliers ont été débarrassés des mutations technologiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los manufactorums de Kiava Gamma empezaron a producir el compuesto que les había sido encomendado por la Red Sanguinolenta. En cubas de armavidrio, se envió a los lugares infectados y se roció sobre las máquinas deformes y la gente afectada. Los talleres fueron purgados de mutaciones tecnológicas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los manufactorums de Kiava Gamma empezaron a producir el compuesto que les había sido encomendado por la Red Sanguinolenta. En cubas de vidriacero, se envió a los lugares infectados y se roció sobre las máquinas deformes y la gente afectada. Los talleres fueron purgados de mutaciones tecnológicas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブより与えられた化合物の製造を開始した。それは装甲ガラスのタンクに封入され、蔓延地域に送ったのちに、歪んだ機械や感染した人々に散布された。作業場から技術変異は一掃された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブより与えられた化合物の製造を開始した。それは装甲ガラスのタンクに封入され、蔓延地域に送ったのちに、歪んだ機械や感染した人々に散布された。作業場から技術変異は一掃された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}基亚瓦伽马星的制造工厂开始生产织血罗网提供的化合物。这种化合物被装在玻璃罐子里，送到技术腐败蔓延的区域，喷洒在受亚空间影响的机器与人类身上，最终消灭了车间里的技术突变。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}基亚瓦伽马星的制造工厂开始生产织血罗网提供的化合物。这种化合物被装在玻璃罐子里，送到技术腐败蔓延的区域，喷洒在受亚空间影响的机器与人类身上，最终消灭了车间里的技术突变。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kiava Gama manufaktorumları, Kanipi Ağı'nın verdiği bileşenin üretimine başladı. Bileşen, zırhcam tanklar içinde istila ceplerine gönderilip çarpıtılmış makinelere ve etkilenen insanlara püskürtüldü. Atölyeler, tekno mutasyonlardan arındırıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Kiava Gamma manufactorums began production of the compound given to them by the Bloodspun Web. In tanks of armaglass, it was sent to the pockets of infestation and sprayed on warped machines and affected people. The workshops were cleared of tech-mutations.{/n}
